thread.title: Jennifer Aniston And Justin Theroux's Breathtaking Honeymoon Spot
thread.title_full: Jennifer Aniston And Justin Theroux's Breathtaking Honeymoon Spot

author: Suzy Strutner
title: Jennifer Aniston And Justin Theroux's Breathtaking Honeymoon Spot
text:
Jennifer Aniston And Justin Theroux's Breathtaking Honeymoon Spot We'll just be here watching "Friends" reruns. Ugh. Suzy Strutner Associate Lifestyle Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/07/2015 12:26 PM EDT Getty Images 
Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux arrived in Bora Bora Thursday for what's sure to be a stunning honeymoon. The couple reportedly wed in a super-private ceremony earlier this week , and they wasted no time jetting to the French Polynesia island to celebrate. 
Here's just a little taste of what JenJust will experience: Getty Images Bora Bora is famed for its striking collection of over-water bungalows , which allow visitors to jump out of bed and immediately into the island's very own intimate lagoon . Getty Images With crystal-clear water and abundant coral reefs, the volcanic island is a perfect place for snorkeling, diving and touring the blazingly blue waters . Paraglide above it all for a romantic little outing you'll never forget. Getty Images By night, visitors to Bora Bora sip cocktails in luxe, lagoon-side hotels and hike up rainforest peaks to catch the sunset.
